title: Photos App Removing Moved Photos Outside of the App
content:
So I have a Google Pixel 4.
And ever since the update of the phone/the photos app in late September my google photos app has been acting weird.
I care a lot about my photo organization, so I like the fact that everything has device folders in addition to being displayed in the camera photo hub.
The problem occurs when I try to move a photo from one folder to another. I move photos from my camera folder to my Pinterest folder, for example, the photo moves fine.
But when I try and view the moved photo anywhere outside of the google photos app, it's completely gone, while simultaneously still existing in the new folder in the photos app.
I just wanted to know if there was any way to fix this so I can organize my photos without fear of "losing" them? Or if this happened to anyone else?
